statements: SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_wallets ORDER BY wallet_id DESC;
SELECT owner_name, balance FROM cryptocurrency_wallets WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT owner_name, private_key FROM cryptocurrency_wallets WHERE owner_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT public_key, balance FROM cryptocurrency_wallets WHERE balance < 500;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_wallets ORDER BY owner_name ASC, balance DESC;
SELECT wallet_id, owner_name, balance FROM cryptocurrency_wallets WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY owner_name DESC
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_wallets WHERE balance <= 5000 AND owner_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY wallet_id ASC
SELECT owner_name, public_key, balance FROM cryptocurrency_wallets WHERE balance < 500 OR owner_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT wallet_id, owner_name, private_key FROM cryptocurrency_wallets WHERE owner_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob') ORDER BY wallet_id
SELECT wallet_id, owner_name, public_key, balance FROM cryptocurrency_wallets WHERE balance BETWEEN 100 AND 1000 ORDER BY balance
SELECT * FROM wallets;
SELECT wallet_id, user_id, balance FROM wallets ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT wallet_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, private_key FROM wallets WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT * FROM wallets WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT wallet_id, balance FROM wallets WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT t.wallet_id, w.user_id, t.amount FROM transactions t INNER JOIN wallets w ON t.wallet_id = w.wallet_id;
SELECT w.user_id, SUM(t.amount) AS total_transactions FROM wallets w INNER JOIN transactions t ON w.wallet_id = t.wallet_id GROUP BY w.user_id;
SELECT * FROM wallets ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM CryptoWalletData;
SELECT wallet_id, public_key FROM CryptoWalletData;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM TransactionData;
SELECT * FROM TransactionData WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT wallet_id, balance FROM WalletBalance;
SELECT * FROM CryptoWalletData ORDER BY wallet_id DESC;
SELECT wallet_id, private_key FROM CryptoWalletData WHERE wallet_id = 2;
SELECT public_key FROM CryptoWalletData WHERE wallet_id = 3 AND private_key IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM TransactionData WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT wallet_id, balance FROM WalletBalance INNER JOIN CryptoWalletData ON WalletBalance.wallet_id = CryptoWalletData.wallet_id;
SELECT * FROM wallet_accounts;
SELECT account_name, private_key FROM wallet_accounts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT id, transaction_type, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_addresses WHERE address LIKE '%abc%';
SELECT account_id, balance FROM wallet_balances WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_accounts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT account_name, private_key FROM wallet_accounts WHERE account_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT id, account_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT address FROM wallet_addresses WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND created_at <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT account_id, balance, last_updated FROM wallet_balances WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM wallet;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallet ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT wallet_id, user_id, currency FROM wallet WHERE currency='USD';
SELECT * FROM private_key WHERE key_type='RSA' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE timestamp > '2023-01-01';
SELECT name, email FROM user WHERE name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM wallet WHERE currency = 'USD' ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT wallet_id, key_value FROM private_key WHERE key_type = 'encryption';
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE amount > 1000 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT currency_code, name, symbol FROM currency;
